content.detailedDescription:
First started at around 2pm cst, i was watching several planes spray chemtrails in the sky, theyn just kept bombarding the sky so i dashed for the camera and started recording for a good half hour or so as it countinued my mom came out and so did my son as we all were gazing the skies my mom quickly directed me to a specific spot in the sky i watch a cylinder craft and as i pointed my camera it zoomed and disapeared as i yedrevieed the video and the dispayed show that i caught what i believe is a split second of the craft, now i am a constant sky watcher and i have been watching planes spraying for years now so i am familar with them and flight patterns. this object i recorded zoomed just seconds after a plane i was recording flew by on its spraying. 

the object looked like a white missle with what i believe to be square black patterns at the back end. i have a older camera and im nneding help uploading this so if anybody can assist please contact me.

well i continued throught the day and evening along with the night and watch nomerous sprayings and star like crafts moving along the eastern skies. trust me they blend in with the night stars but wernt stars i attempted to record these but were faint enough that the video camera couldnt detect em but myself along with a witness using binoculars have observed em. 

as the night continued i video tape a plane spraying the just from the front end came a unidetified craft heads on and continued following the exact trail the first plane left as it reached far west enough another craft followed the same chem-trail heading the opposite way.

alot of activity was happening last night and these are not my first sightings, i have been a constant night and day sky watcher to know what i am seeing....
content.summary: Multiple sightings all day and night while chemtrails were being sprayed

content.detailedDescription:
At 10pm 3 persons exit rear of house to talk & check out stars on pretty clear night. when turning eastward toward full moon, we are all amazed to see a very large, dense, low, cigar shaped white cloud all by itself almost directly over us. there was a cloud bank way off to the east but this monster cloud just seemed soo out of place. the definite cigar shape, size and low altitude was eerie. 

with the bright full moon in the same direction but slightly below, we could see details. there was lots of swirling movement, especially on the cloud's edges but the cloud itself did not move. i used 3 stars to judge its position and for at least 30 minutes there was no change. there also appeared to be a halo of darker air around the cloud?? the size, shape, density and location did not change while we observed it.

it was so eerie that we stepped inside to look up "cigar clouds" on the internet. as pics immediately came up that looked similar, my friend went back out to re-check but then hollered that it had disappeared!! we all ran outside and searched the now clear sky. this was under 5 minutes.. more like 2 or 3 minutes? how 30 minutes of no change and then in under 5 minutes be totally gone without a trace! weird weird cloud???
content.summary: Weird thick low huge cigar cloud 30mins, poof gone in 5min re-check

content.detailedDescription:
Where: i was at hillside cemetery.

who: with my friend. there were also a few other people there at the cemetery as well approximately 4 others. 

what: i saw a ball of light that traveled slowly over my head and behind me. it was high in the sky. miles above me. it kept traveling at a bit of an arc, but not straight. it dimmed for a second and then another ball of light appeared near that was a bit more red than the first ball of light that i saw. 

the reddish ball of light faded out and the first ball of light that i saw kept going in the direction that it was in and then it disappeared. neither of the lights made any noise. they were about the size of a penny if you held it at arms length away from you. 

when: it was at 11:30

weather: partially cloudy, but you could see the object when it went behind the clouds. 
 
feelings: i felt warm and happy when they went by. i was happy when i saw the objects in the sky. i saw something similar to what i saw tonight almost a year ago on june 20th 2010 (it's the 14th today).
content.summary: A ball of light that travelled slowly and made no noise.

content.detailedDescription: Around 10:30 pm in my hometown of knoxville tn, i witnessed a very vividly bright blueish white orb (very similar to the north-star) lazily drifting downward & to the northeast in a slow, lackadaisical manner. it's behavioral pattern didn't appear random, as it did seem to be following a very linear path as if it were under intelligent control. strangely enough, i recalled seeing two jets flying in very close proximity to each other on the exact same path earlier in that afternoon which i managed to snap a picture of on my iphone (which i will attach) the pic is a little blurry, but you can make out the 2 jets if you just look closely. i apologize for that, but it's the best i could get. these two events could be completely unrelated although it did strike me as an odd coincidence.
content.summary: Star-like bright blue orb lazily drifting downward & to the north-east

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to wait on my sister to come over after work, i brought my hi-8 out with me. my daughter my sis, and i were all sitting out front talking. and i noticed something that appeared solid like a star but "much" bigger it went over head of us, over the house (heading north), then it appeared to make a abrupt right turn from where it was going around the back of my house and start moving northeast.(heading northeast). we all watched it and followed behind the house to try to record more video of it.
it was definatly something else.. 

1.)sitting out front talking,i had been out on the porch using one of my other cameras to take shots of the moon.
2.)looking at the stars off and on.
3.) at first i thought it might be a satelite but it was much bigger 
4.)it made a turn behind my house and started moving in another direction.
5.)i was excited, i yelled for my sister to look right now~ she was texting on her phone. after the sighting i felt it was something else..
6.)i lost sight of the object after it went over the building behind my house, and became to far away to get anymore video of it.

unfortunatly this hi-8 video, i cannot convert, so i will need help with it.
content.summary: Ball of light-hi-8 video recorded of object.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of june 13th, 2011 at approximately 08:15 pm, two hillsville residents were standing out in their driveway, when one spotted a cigar-shaped craft "gliding" across the cloudless sky from north to south. the craft appeared to be silver or light in color, as it reflected the sun and made no noise and left no chemtrail. though strange, the event seemed insignificant until another identical craft came into view less than one minute later, following the same altitude and path. the two original witnesses were then joined by two additional persons, and they all continued to watch as three more of the same type of crafts followed, appearing about one minute apart. the only difference in the three subsequent crafts was that they were still appearing to adhere to the same directional path but flew lower or higher than the originial two. no more than five minutes later, another craft appeared coming from the opposite direction of the original five, this one flying from southeast to northwest. speed and altitude were similar but the craft seemed orange in color (perhaps a reflection of the setting sun which was an orange/pink hue). then rather quickly, perhaps within thirty seconds of the former, another craft was seen flying from the original north position, but was traveling southwest, instead of directly south. occurring at the same time, an easily discernible commercial plane was flying from south to north. following closely behind but at a slower speed, characteristic of the other unidentified crafts, another craft travels from southeast to northwest. traveling parallel but in the exact opposite direction, another one of the crafts is seen. the two parallel crafts appear from the naked eye and with aid of a digital camera, to be dangerously close to one another. (never seen with commercial flights.) their average speeds appeared to be "too slow" for any familiar craft at such low altitudes. this was apparent to the original witness, of military background, but obvious to the other witnesses as well. moments after the previous three were witnessed all at once, a dark or black craft of indiscernible shape was seen traveling from northeast to southwest, but was on a completely separate path than any of the other crafts. during the entire event, one witness was using an application (planefinder)on his iphone, which turned up no commercial flights at the time, with the exception of the obvious aforementioned flight. the entire event lasted approximately thirty minutes, with no more activity observed from the witnesses for the additional half hour they remained outside.
content.summary: 10 unidentified cigar-shaped crafts 'glide" over hillsville, va

content.detailedDescription: Stepped out back amd looked up and saw a very bright object coming out of the west heading in a direct line east, moved very fast covered the sky horizon to horizon very quickly. observed the last moments with binoculars it had no blinking colored lights like aircraft just a very bright white light
content.summary: Very bright very fast moving object

content.detailedDescription: i went out in backyard, looked at the stars and saw three white lights middle one offset front..Listened for jet sound, did not hear any sound. went in got binocs and saw nothing but the three lights, then went behind trees..I thought it was just an aicraft, however, no red or green lights as would be on winged aircraft  and no strobes..Lights traveled in straight line ,no strobe, no sound. dissapeard behind trees where i could no longer see..This was around 11;05 pm on monday night. sky was clear and stars were visible..Altitude looked to be above 10,000ft. i am highly trained observer. this looked like a commercial aircraft, but as i said, it did not have strobes or wing lights of red, or green..And i heard no noise..I can hear jet noise from thousands of feet.This one had none.
content.summary: Three white lights traveling together

content.detailedDescription:
It looked just like a large star traveling very fast and leaving no sound
whatsoever.  it seemed to be traveling east.  there were no blinking lights and nothing to show it was an airplane or blimp.  it was moving way too fast.
content.summary: A single bright white light no sound at all

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my backyard around reading emails and checking web sites on my ipod (via wi-fi). i was occasionally glancing at the sky as the birds are very active right now and i'm always watching to see who is active in my backyard. 
the sky was bright with a few fluffy clouds...Very clear light before the sun sets.
i looked up and a shiny object caught my eye. it was moving from north to south quickly at a very high altitude...Though not much faster than a jet at that altitude would move. i am convinced though that this was not a jet. it was cylindrical in shape but did not have any wings. it's shape was more ambiguous and less defined than that of an airplane. there was no sound or jet trail. it appeared to have a darker spot in the middle and the whole object was more shimmery and shiny than an airplane.
i did hurry to take a video on my ipod, but it is very pixilated and useless for any kind of identification as there is no "zoom" feature on it. the object crossed the sky until it went beyond my field of vision, as there are many trees surrounding my property.
i live near an airport, but i am sure this was not an airplane.
content.summary: Silver bullet-shaped object crossing sky from north to south

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen these objects the last 4 nights in a row. last night was the most insane experience of my life, massive amounts of ufo activity. it went on for 2 hours (10pm-12am) or so, at times there was one hovering directly over my house. whatever this was knew i was there, and knew i was watching it. at one point i got a clear look at the craft, looked to be cigar shaped silver craft. at one point it just got closer and closer and i was even startled by how close it got and how well i could make it out. there appeared to be something around it that i can only compare to a humming birds wings  these things mimic air planes, and stars to avoid detection. 

as i said i have seen these objects for four nights in a row, so i made it a point to go outside with my camera  at half time of the nba finals game.
content.summary: Lights moving in sky 4th night in a row, hovered above my house. cigar shaped object got very close

content.detailedDescription:
I was filming what i thought was a ufo just after getting dark . when i replayed it on my big screen t.V. i noticed the other ufo making some really quick action to get out of the way of the first ufo. 
so i retaped it in slow motion . so this is it my friends !
content.summary: Ufo preenting crash with other ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I'm not sure what it is that i captured on camera but i thought i'd send the pictures in the hope that you would be able to help identify exactly what it is.I took these pictures a few years back in simi valley,ca while watching my sons footabll practice. i first noticed a bright light in the sky so i grabbed my camera and by the time i was able to take the first picture it had already started to streak across the sky then turned into about four little lights then disappered. i was able to capture the four atttached pictres. then when i got home i was on my balcony telling my neigbor what happened when i saw two helicopters a jet flying around they did two loops around where i saw the object then left.I was told that it was some kind of rocket thats why i have never sent the pictures in before but every time i see them it get me curious as to what it is that i captured on camera. if you could with my curiosity i would appreciate it.
                                                (name deleted)fg
content.summary: Long trail in tne sky to dots of bright lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw this video online   [link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
 and tried it myself.  i believe there are beings out there and this could be my second ufo encounter.  i followed what that guy did in the video and then waited.  i did see some strange streaks but nothing i could take a photo of.  i waited about 10 minutes or so and saw a strange round cloud over the next office building adjacent to my job.  this was after i said outloud....Ok show up over that building and let me take a picture.  i snapped two pictures using my samsung epic smartphone.  the cloud looked odd but i can be explained i am sure.  after reviewing the pictures, that is when i saw the strange object.  i am not sure what that is to be honest.  just a strange coincidence considering me trying what that guy did in that video.  yea, i thought it was retarded at first...But i don't knock it until i try it.  the photos are time stamped automatically by the phone.  one photo shows the object to the upper left...The second photo was taken around 15 seconds after the initial one.
content.summary: I think i summoned a ufo

content.detailedDescription: Witness left message with mufon stated he saw lights inside the big dipper moving in various directions.
content.summary: Unknow lights

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my driveway talking with some friends when i looked up at the stars.  number one appeared as a bright flash to my sw.  it was like a meteorite lasting only a few seconds from south to north.  number two started a south to north track east of number one.  it came directly overheaed.  as i turned to keep watching it, i lost it or it disapeared.  number three started a south to north long track east of number two almost overhead.  it continues north as number four apears west of three.  number four starts a long track north to south, then turns on a long arc to the east.  each of these eventually disapear.  3 and 4 are the longest viewed ones, about a min or two apiece.  i thought they were aircraft, but they had no nav lights or strobes, only a single white light.  i then thought maybe satalites, but so many in one part of the sky is unusual.  all four looked like high altitude objects.  no other aircraft were seen in the area.
content.summary: Four star like objects moving in seperate directions.

content.detailedDescription:
I was going up stairs to go to bed, and stopped mid-way on the stairs for a minute to look out the window and up at the sky.  the sky was clear, with a not-quite full moon to the south, and i saw several small twinkling stars and a plane in-flight with the usual blinking navigation lights.  there are large maple trees across the street from my house, but a good portion of the open sky is visible between the tops of the maples and my vantage point at the window.  as i looked at the sky, i spotted what appeared to be a very bright star, as large or slightly larger than the planet venus would appear.  as i looked at it, i realized it was moving and thought maybe it's a satellite.  it traveled directly from the west, i guess about as fast as a plane, but this had no blinking lights, and i heard no sound (the window was open slightly, and this being a small town on late sunday night, you could hear a pin drop).  i thought, "how odd" and realized it would fly directly over my house, and if i hurried up the rest of the stairs and into the spare bedroom, maybe i could see it from the window on the east side of the house.  so i hurried and got to the window (all the while thinking this is nuts, it's 11:30 and i really need to get to bed).  i looked at the sky, expecting to see this object continue on it's way toward the east or northeast, but had to wait 10 or 15 seconds.  suddenly there it was - and as it passed overhead  and continued on (and the sky is still clear at this point, and my vantage point is clear - no obstructions) i watched it and realized it was not moving in a smooth/straight fashion.  it made slight zig-zag movements to the left and right; i imagined driving my car and rapidly jerking the steering wheel would make the same movement.  i have seen satellites move across the sky and i believe they are much faster,  smaller and not as bright as this object.  and i don't think they move erratically like this thing did.  i have seen a number of ufos before (large moon-like object, small red bullet shapes, disc that made a rapid 90-degree turn) but this type is new to me.  the wobbly-ness of it, brightness, and lack of navigation lights/sound made me think - ufo!

i watched it until i could no longer see it because of the trees on the horizon.
content.summary: Bright, star-like object moves quickly west to east, zig-zag/wobbling

content.detailedDescription:
Kevinmc360 recorded this event. i copied the videos from youtube; kevinmc360 ufo and the oakland debunking video.
  no one has pointed out that these moving 5 star like objects passed behind a stationary starlike object. i have enclosed photos. 
  if you can get kevinmc360 to help you determine what the stationary star light object was, and where it is; that the 5 star like objects passed behind. it can help determine how far away and how large the 5 star like objects are.
   i seen this type with my own eyes passing behind stars before;and thats why i noticed it.
content.summary: 5 star like objects passing behind another star like object

content.detailedDescription: I was in my living room watching movies when i noticed a light shinning so brightly i could see it through the closed blinds.  i went outside to take a look at what was causing the bright light and i took binoculars with me, i live directly on the water of saginaw bay.  through the binoculars the object appeared as a large white light with blue light sometimes flashing erratically around the bottom.  this made me think it was a coast guard or law enforcement ship of some kind, i thought they may be arresting some drunken night boaters perhaps.  this light would randomly flash very brightly, and appeared to be directional. it was so bright at times it illuminated the tops of our boats sitting on the beach, and this object seemed to be at least a mile away.  then thought maybe this was a search light and they are looking for a ship that's in trouble.  the object faded to a dark orange/amber color and headed out into the bay while still randomly becoming bright white, sometimes only for a moment, sometimes for a few seconds.  it appeared as sometimes white sometimes red small dot and began moving back towards land then out into the bay again still flashing brightly occasionally as if on a dimmer switch.  at this point it moved back out into the bay again but at a very high speed, much faster than any boat of any kind.  this is when i realized it was not any kind of boat or ship that i was aware of and i now thought it may be a helicopter. i went to wake up my father after i realized it wasn't a seafaring vessel of any kind.  as he came outside to look at it i saw if fade until it disappeared through the binoculars as it headed north into the bay.  after it faded away and i took my binoculars away from my eyes and saw a helicopter coming from the bay city area out into the saginaw bay and towards where the object had been.  when the helicopter neared the general area of where the object seemed to disappear it appeared to begin to search the area for several minutes.  the helicopter seemed to be just south of where the object faded away.  then the helicopter flew quickly north, turned around and came back near the first area they searched.  the helicopter seemed to search a few more minutes and then headed east.  this helicopter was obviously different from the other object.  the helicopter had a white light in the front and a red blinking tail light, i could also hear the helicopter as it flew south after it quickly headed north.  i heard no sound coming from the ufo or maybe uso.  it was very low to the horizon and appeared to be at least a mile away.  someone in the sebawaing area may have been able to see what it was more closely.  it could have been a helicopter with strange lights i've never seen before but it was obviously different from the helicopter that came after it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Very bright white light low over saginaw bay

content.detailedDescription: Recorded a very strange craft over chicago today june 12 2011. i uploaded it to youtube to view. search strange shape shifting ufo chicago to watch. i dont know what it is only that it wasnt a balloon or garbage flying over. it reflected light and changed various shapes but stayed mostly snake like in its move movement. hopefully some one out there knows what it is. i admit that i am pro ufo so i am biased to what it is but who knows. no pics below only video on the web. thanks!
content.summary: Strange shape shifting anamoly over chicago search youtube 1080p video

content.detailedDescription:
8:10 pm 
sunday, june 12, 2011

location- sitting in my hot tub looking at the  night sky in kailua, hawaii.
visibility- slightly cloudy, winds 5-10 mph, half moon

description:
a steady, singular bright light with a slightly yellow cast appeared over my head from behind, so i did not see its approach.  it traveled  from south/ southwest to north/ north east in a straight line for 6 seconds and disappeared beyond my ability to view because of tree cover. the light was traveling very fast, and it disappeared and reappeared in the cloud cover, as if it were flying through the clouds.  the clouds were cumulus, and lit by a half moon. the light was not an airplane as it was as fast as the blue angels which i have observed and it was silent, and it was not a satellite as  it was traveling across their usual path and, as described, was at a much lower altitude my estimate being around 2000- 3000 feet.


at first i thought it must be an airplane, but  quickly i realized it was too low and fast, around the speed of the blue angels that perform here on occasion,  and that it was a singular light was unusual.  i shifted to curiosity and a sense of fun and wonder, and i wished for it to do something interesting, like an abrupt directional change  as the contrails that i have observed would require. it didn't, it just flew strait and i was once again left with a feeling that there is a sense of humor at play.  i had actually been asking to " see one " for a while now, so seeing it like this seems funny to me.  i actually could even say that i feel i have a relationship with whatever is going on- whether or not that is my imagination- who knows!
content.summary: low flying fast light in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen this a few times before. no i am not crazy or totally psychotic. as i was outside on my porch smoking a cigarette (not a funny cigarette), i briefly saw a flashing light, just above the roof of another apartment. it flashed red for one moment. it then disappeared briefly. i then saw a brilliant white light flash across the sky. about a minute or two later, i saw a bright white/yellow orb to the near-right of my vision. whatever it was, it must have been way up there, approx. at least 20,000 to 30,000 feet up. the object then moved slowly to the southeast. it was unlike an aircraft. aircraft in the area (from oak int'l and sfo) would have been only about 10,000 feet up. 
i have seen this kind of thing before, by the way, about two weeks ago, and previous to this. when i saw this, i was kind of freaked out. the hairs on my head, and upper head, had a strange sensation. it was as if something was "pulling them up" or some kind of device was tripped off by the ufo. 
this has also happened previously last summer while at the sea ranch, ca, south of gualala, ca. i had not thought about calling law enforcement at that time or this time. i lost sight of the ufos as they went to the southeast of my vision, and disappeared beyond the trees. 
about jan. or feb. of this year, i saw what appeared to be a large comet falling on the east bay area within 50 miles to the north of me. when i told others of this, they stated nothing was seen by them. and they looked oddly at me.
content.summary: Bright white light, first multicolored, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
In may , 2011 i went to yunnan province for travelling.
it was the time when i went to small minority tribe village.
i took some pic.

and i came back to my home seoul, korea.
i organized my pics which were taken for yunam travelling.
and i found that pic. 
i tried to enlarge my pic. and that point shaped like triangle.
i've been wondering since finding that pic.

i believe that the point is not dust on lens.
and as you can see distance was too far to see like kite or any plane.

please find my pic out and reply your view

thank you for helping me.
content.summary: Shaped triangle ufo.

content.detailedDescription: In the mid-1970's i was riding my mother-in-law's bike and a very large disc shaped, silvery space ship hovered over me...I started riding around noonish and suddenly 5 or so hours just vanished.  it was getting dark..But i hadn't gone anywhere!  but my sighting report is not so much about seeing this ufo...It is about my many encounters with extraterrestrial beings, mostly in my home.  all together, there have been 9 encounters..The one that stands out in my mind the most:  my daughter and i were coming home from a long day of work and school.  she went directly to take her shower to get to bed quickly...I gathered up her things and walking from the kitchen to the living room...Suddenly three beings..Not human..Appeared before me.  i was stunned to say the least.  they were each different in size and shape, but all had medium grey coloured skin, longish arms, fewer fingers than humans, a large head and prominent eyes..Very big eyes with a seemingly second eye.  the first one to the left was larger than the others...He looked directly at me as i was only a foot or so from him i could see him well.  the one standing next to him was a bit smaller and the third was smaller yet, standing in the doorway of the bedroom.  the larger one said telepathically to me:  "we're sorry you saw us; we're leaving now"...The whole room became bathed in a glow of sparkley substance...They literally went up through the ceiling and dissapeared.  all the time they were with me i sensed they were benevolent...Almost kind.  it was an amazing experience i could never, ever forget.  i told my daughter immediately as she wrapped her towel around her...I was concerned that she was ok...Did they see her too? i wondered.  we stayed up a long while, hugging and wondering who they were....The next morning as we were in the kitchen, she asked me "what are those red dots on your arm, mama?"  i looked and saw them in a circle.  i then checked to see if she had them and she did.  i realized they had come to see her too!  i have told a few select people..Friends..Family..But not many.  it was a lot to "wrap one's brain around".  since that night (and prior to that encounter) both my daughter and i have had further encounters with them.  i am glad to report they never caused us any physical pain and every time seemed to express a concern for our well-being.  i am more curious now than afraid.
content.summary: On another date, in the mid 1970's i saw a ufo right above me..This report tho, is about direct contact with extraterrestrials...

content.detailedDescription: I just was outside having a smoke. i noticed a bright star, it was not moving at first, then just slowly started moving north east. it just drifted silent over my house and continued in a north east direction. totally silent, and not blinking.
content.summary: Slow moving silent star

content.detailedDescription:
4 of us were sitting on the steps of my friends house in witt illinois facing east between the hours of 8pm and 10pm there was no moon and the sky was clear. my friend and i had been catching lightning bug in the empty lot next to my home.  we had sat down on his front porch with his mother and father and were talking when we saw a bright orange yellow object crossing the sky from south to north, well above the trees it was standing upright with a trapezoid top and bottom and a square shaped center section, out of the bottom was what looked like an upside down martini glass the width of the object. the object traveled in a sideways "s" pattern moving up and down as it crossed the sky. it made no sound we could hear and left a trail as tall as the object and following the same sideways "s" pattern the trail was a couple of waves behind the object and faded away. the object vanished out of line of sight.  using google earth i put our location that night at(coordinates deleted)fg elev 666ft.  my friend and i were young kids when this happened and i have never seen a craft like this described in any other sighting, and i an curious if there have been other craft like this seen before.
i grew up in witt and left in 1989 and moved to arizona and i can still see that object moving across the sky when i think back to that night and i an seeking information on the object we saw that night.
content.summary: Trapezoid top bottom box shape center upside down martini glass base

content.detailedDescription: Wife was on the phone outside having a cigerette in the drive way in front of the house facing south directly at the moon. she came and got me and i ran out and watched it for a brief moment then ran in to grab cell phone to video record it. it traveled behind the moon and it appeared as a bright light but in trianglular form. it traveled faster than a plane but made no sound and had no blinking lights. it was a clear sky with just moon out. it looked like a ball of light as it got further away traveling ne and then seemed to vier east.It continued over the town untill it was out of sight. we only saw it for a few minutes. the sighting left us in awe and bewildered. i wanted to get in my truck and follow it but didn't.
content.summary: Brighter than a star no blinking lights looked like a triangle and a ball of light as it got further away.

content.detailedDescription: At the time mentioned, i was watching television in my home. the living room is oriented to east, with a large window allowing a view to the east. i glanced out the window into the darkened sky and noticed a bright star in view. i didn't think anything of it until i looked away, in my peripheral field i noticed a small amount of movement. i refocused and noticed it was on a straight trajectory from right to left in my field of vision. i noted the time and went outside and stood on my front doorstep. the object had moved slightly more to the left and continued its trajectory to the northeast. at the same time, i noticed an airplane flying above an behind the object, the plane appeared to be headed in the opposite direction and more to the southeast. i watched as the smooth movement of the object took it beyond the horizon. at no time did it slow or speed up. nor did it blink or change colors. the star like appearance remained constant. the size and brightness of it was very comparable to other bright stars.
content.summary: Moving, silent star moving across sky

content.detailedDescription:
Ese da sbado 9 de mayo, llegue de mi trabajo a eso de las 7:30 de la noche me acost en el piso del solar de mi casa a descansar. como de costumbre me gusta observar las estrellas en el cielo, transcurrido cierto tiempo me llama la atencin una estrella fugaz desplazndose en sentido nor-este. en las estrellas fugaz por lo general la estela tiende a desaparecer lo cual no ocurra en sta, de repente observ un disco redondo en la punta de la estela descendiendo a una velocidad increble, acto seguido me levante muy impresionado pues no sabia de que se trataba. me coloqu en el marco de la puerta que da con la cocina de mi casa, pero sin perder de vista el objeto el cual era de color pardo y no emitia ninguna luz al tiempo que se desplazaba a una gran velocidad en linea recta y ascendia, perdiendose de vista. pense llamar a alguien para que tambien viera el extrao objeto, pero en mi casa no habia nadie ya que mi esposa y mis hijas estaban en una reunion familiar.
despues de haberme ocurrido este suceso observo constantemente el cielo para ver si puedo volver a observar este fenomeno; me hubiese gustado que alguien mas pudiese haber tenido este contacto.
en conclusion para mi el fenomeno ovni existe despues de vivir esta experiencia extraordinaria, pienso que no estamos solos en el universo pues el avistamiento constante de este tipo de objeto hace suponer que estamos en presencia de civilizaciones con una inteligencia muy superior a la nuestra.

translation:
that day on saturday may 9, comes from my work at about 7:30 pm i slept on the floor  solar home to rest. as usual i like to watch the stars in the sky after some time i called the attention shifts a shooting star n ndos in northeast direction. shooting stars in the wake usually tends to disappear which is not ocurra in   sta, suddenly observes  a round disc on the end of the trail down to a speed incredible, immediately followed up too impressed because i did not know about question.  i put under the door that leads to my kitchen, but without losing sight of the object which was brown and did not issue any light while traveling at high speed in a straight line and amounted out of sight. i thought to call someone who also saw the strange object  o, but no one was home because my wife and my daughters were at a family reunion.
 after this event having occurred constantly watch the sky to see if i can return to observe this phenomenon, i would have liked someone else might have had this contact.
 in conclusion ufo phenomenon for me to live there after this extraordinary experience, i think we are not alone in the universe because the constant sighting of this object suggests that we are dealing with civilizations with an intelligence far superior to ours.
content.summary: Rapida velocidad de descenso desde el firmamento y desplazamiento horizontal

content.detailedDescription: I was outside of my trailer at about 3:20am. i often wake up in the middle of the night. i have a beautiful 360 degree view of the night sky. i was facing towards the southern sky when a meteor like object crossed the sky heading towards the west. the object stopped moving, hovered briefly, appeared to back up slightly and the accelerated towards the west again yet in a steeper trajectory. the object was a yellow light that appeared to be about five miles away. i felt elated as i had always wanted to see a ufo.  i turned around to see if anything else was occurring. i did see meteor crossing the big dipper constellation but it's behavior appeared normal and it wasn't as bright as the first object. we often get meteor showers here in az so i thought this was a coincidence. in retrospect, i recalled seeing objects similar to the hovering object earlier this winter as i was driving back from flagstaff on 180n. the area was near mile marker 241 about halfway between flagstaff and where i live in valle, az. at the time  i thought the objects i had observed were meteors or flare guns being used by hunters. i observed them on the side of the road through the trees and low to the horizon.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A yellow light sped across the sky from east to west, stopped, hovered and then accelerated and disappeared in a different trajectory
